title: Fireside with the Underboss - The Dog Told Me To Kill Her
description:
Sammy talks about what it was like in the mafia while the Son of Sam was at large in their neighborhood. It's almost impossible to imagine living so close to something so gruesome and terrifying that it even kept the mafia on their toes.
Long Description
